decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable

Class RenderOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.gdxmodel.renderable.RenderOperation

  • public class RenderOperation
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides information about where and how a Renderable should be rendered. This object manages the life-cycle of the necessary gdx objects (such as SpriteBatches and BitmapFonts) to avoid individual components having to manage this themselves with the possibility of memory leaks occurring.
